summary:
Don Lemon recently responded to Stephen Colbert's dig at his hoodie-suit combo on CNN This Morning. In response, Don explained why he flaunts the style status quo. He said that he wears the outfit to show that "anything is possible." He also said that he doesn't think Colbert understands the power of style.
